    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.mutate.client  

    • Uses of MutatorClientBuilder in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.mutate.client

      Methods in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.mutate.client that return MutatorClientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MutatorClientBuilder MutatorClientBuilder.addSinkTable(String databaseName, String tableName)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a mutation event destination (an ACID table) to be managed by this client, which is either unpartitioned or will is not to have partitions created automatically.
      MutatorClientBuilder MutatorClientBuilder.addSinkTable(String databaseName, String tableName, boolean createPartitions)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a partitioned mutation event destination (an ACID table) to be managed by this client, where new partitions will be created as needed.
      MutatorClientBuilder MutatorClientBuilder.addSourceTable(String databaseName, String tableName)
      Deprecated. 
      Adds a mutation event destination (an ACID table) to be managed by this client, which is either unpartitioned or will is not to have partitions created automatically.

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated. 
       
      MutatorClientBuilder MutatorClientBuilder.lockFailureListener(LockFailureListener lockFailureListener)
      Deprecated. 
      Set a listener to handle Lock failure events - highly recommended.

      Deprecated.
